mapper.select: select p.name,p.url,p.pid,p.id from user u left join user_role ur on u.id = ur.uid left join role_permission rp on ur.rid = rp.rid left join permission p on p.id = rp.pid where u.id = #{id}
select count(*) from permission where name = #{name}
select id, name, desc_ 'desc', url, pid from permission
select id, name, desc_ 'desc', url from permission where pid = 0
mapper.insert: insert into permission(name, desc_, url, pid) values(#{name}, #{desc}, #{url}, #{pid})
mapper.update: update permission set name = #{name}, desc_ = #{desc}, url = #{url}, pid = #{pid} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, name, desc_ 'desc', url, pid from permission where id = #{id}
